description: 2014 NC Food Truck Championship Award Winner. If you’d like to read about how amazing our owner and head chef is, check out Bon Appetit Magazine, and The Times-Picayune. No joke, he is the real deal and has been featured in multiple articles about great chefs and delicious meals. Food critics have described his cooking as “heavenly” and “a hip blend of Creole and Cajun.” Micah Martello at King Creole Food Truck is definitely the guy to visit if you’re looking to take your tastebuds on a culinary adventure.
name: King Creole
